greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular array formed from elements to left of middle of Pascal's triangle.
comment: Coefficients for Pontryagin classe of projective spaces. See p. 3 of the Wilson link. Aerated to become a lower triangular matrix with alternating zeros on the diagonal, this matrix appparently becomes the reverse, or mirror, of A117178. - _Tom Copeland_, May 30 2017
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..200 of triangle, flattened
D. Wilson, Genera: From cobordism to K-theory, Jul 2016.
Index entries for triangles and arrays related to Pascal's triangle
xref: Cf. A001791 (a half-diagonal and diagonal sums).
results.author: _Mohammad K. Azarian_
